attributes.action: Charge fat people double fare on public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Far too many overweight people take up more than one space on public transport because of their fatness, which means, one less normal sized person hasnt got a space to sit down.
So, I think fat people should be charged a double fare for taking up 2 seats, as they are certainly using to seats! You know you agree and you know it annoys you :D

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
